= mudmonth =

== Syntax ==
 variable: '''mudmonth''' (Read-only)

== Description ==
The '''mudmonth''' variable returns the current month number in the MUD's internal time system. This built-in variable allows DIL programs to track and respond to seasonal changes, monthly events, and time-based conditional logic within the game world.

== Field Access ==
{| class="wikitable"
! Access !! Type !! Description
|-
| Read || integer || Returns the current month number (0-based)
|}

== Examples ==
 dilbegin seasonal_event();
 var
    current_month : integer;
    month_name : string;
    month_names : stringlist;
 code
 {
    month_names := {"Month of Winter", "Month of the Winter Wolf",
                   "Month of the Frost Giant", "Month of the Spring",
                   "Month of Futility", "Month of the Sun", 
                   "Month of the Heat", "Month of the Long Shadows",
                   "Month of the Ancient Darkness"};
    
    current_month := mudmonth;
    month_name := month_names.[current_month];
    
    exec("say Welcome to " + month_name + "!", self);
    
    // Seasonal behavior
    if (current_month <= 2)  // Winter months (0-2)
    {
       exec("say It's cold outside, bundle up!", self);
    }
    else if (current_month <= 5)  // Spring months (3-5)
    {
       exec("say The flowers are blooming!", self);
    }
    else if (current_month <= 7)  // Summer months (6-7)
    {
       exec("say It's a beautiful summer day!", self);
    }
    else  // Fall months (8-8)
    {
       exec("say The leaves are changing colors!", self);
    }
 } dilend

 dilbegin time_display();
 var
    buffer : string;
    month_names : stringlist;
    day_names : stringlist;
    month_idx : integer;
    day_idx : integer;
    hour_12 : integer;
    ampm : string;
 code
 {
    month_names := {"Month of Winter", "Month of the Winter Wolf",
                   "Month of the Frost Giant", "Month of the Spring",
                   "Month of Futility", "Month of the Sun", 
                   "Month of the Heat", "Month of the Long Shadows",
                   "Month of the Ancient Darkness"};
    
    day_names := {"the Day of the Bull", "the Day of the Deception",
                  "the Day of Thunder", "the Day of Freedom",
                  "the Day of the Great Gods", "the Day of the Sun",
                  "the Day of the Moon"};
    
    month_idx := mudmonth;
    day_idx := mudday % 7;
    hour_12 := mudhour;
    
    if (hour_12 == 0)
    {
       hour_12 := 12;
       ampm := "O-clock, Midnight!";
    }
    else if (hour_12 == 12)
    {
       ampm := "O-clock, High noon!";
    }
    else if (hour_12 < 12)
    {
       ampm := "AM";
    }
    else
    {
       hour_12 := hour_12 - 12;
       ampm := "PM";
    }
    
    buffer := "It is " + itoa(hour_12) + " " + ampm + ", on " + day_names.[day_idx] + ",<br/>";
    buffer := buffer + "the " + itoa(mudday + 1) + "th Day of the " + month_names.[month_idx] +
              ", Year " + itoa(mudyear) + ".<br/>";
    
    sendtext(buffer, self);
 } dilend

 dilbegin monthly_festival();
 var
    current_month : integer;
 code
 {
    :check_month:
    current_month := mudmonth;
    
    // Different festival each month
    if (current_month == 0)  // Month of Winter
    {
       exec("say The Winter Festival begins!", self);
       exec("emote lights torches and prepares hot cider.", self);
    }
    else if (current_month == 3)  // Month of the Spring
    {
       exec("say The Spring Celebration starts!", self);
       exec("emote decorates with flowers and ribbons.", self);
    }
    else if (current_month == 6)  // Month of the Heat
    {
       exec("say The Summer Solstice Festival!", self);
       exec("emote prepares for the longest day of the year.", self);
    }
    else if (current_month == 8)  // Month of the Ancient Darkness
    {
       exec("say The Harvest Festival begins!", self);
       exec("emote gathers crops for the coming winter.", self);
    }
    
    // Wait until next month
    while (mudmonth == current_month)
    {
       pause;
    }
    goto check_month;
 } dilend

== Usage Notes ==
* The '''mudmonth''' variable is read-only and cannot be modified
* Month numbers are 0-based (0 = first month, 8 = last month in the example)
* The MUD typically has 9 months (0-8) as shown in the example
* Used in conjunction with '''mudday''', '''mudhour''', and '''mudyear''' for complete time tracking
* Common month themes from the example:
** 0-2: Winter months
** 3-5: Spring months  
** 6-7: Summer months
** 8: Fall month

== Error Handling ==
* The variable is always available and does not generate runtime errors
* Returns valid integer values (0-8) in all contexts
